english: to distance oneself, to drift apart
to get along, to hit it off
to set against, to cause enmity
to lavish attention on, to wine and dine
to gratinate, to broil with cheese
to carry out, to perform (a role)
to dismiss, to remove from office
to go viral, to make viral
to make, to tailor, to prepare
to transfer, to move, to convey
to embody, to express, to capture
to weigh up, to consider carefully
to make an impression, to affect
certificate of life, proof of living
to deepen, to go deeper into
to emit, to issue, to broadcast
to watch over, to look after
to deal with, to be about
to lead to, to flow into
to serve as, to act as
to result in, to lead to
